body_html: Thank you @asimshankar for suggesting we use the Sequential model instead of model subclassing for the Generator and Discriminator classes. The current code is using tf.contrib.eager.defun to boost performance. Can we still use defun with the Sequential model? My understanding is that defun is typically applied in the forward computation, backward computation for the gradients and applications of gradients to variables.

body: Thank you @asimshankar for suggesting we use the Sequential model instead of model subclassing for the Generator and Discriminator classes. The current code is using  tf.contrib.eager.defun to boost performance. Can we still use defun with the Sequential model? My understanding is that defun is typically applied in the forward computation, backward computation for the gradients and applications of gradients to variables.
